attributes.action: Russia have nuclear bunkers for all of their citizens. We should too!
attributes.additional_details: The recent story from Pravda tells us that Moscow, Russia is now prepared for a possible nuclear attack upon their country with enough underground bomb shelters for the entire population of the Russian capital. Telling us that 100% of the city's population will be able to be protected as a result of new approaches to civil defense, we're also told their bunkers are completely maintained, stocked and ready to go should they be needed due to a 'man-made emergency or nuclear attack'.
attributes.background: The recent story from Pravda tells us that  Russia is now prepared for a possible nuclear attack on their country with enough underground bomb shelters for the entire population of the Russian capital. I'm sure a tax increase for something like this would be accepted but it should be for BHAM too.
